title.rendered: Smile On Wheels project launched in Muthayanagara

content.rendered: Senior citizens at Muthayanagara slum in Bengaluru inaugurated a new Smile on Wheels mobile hospital project, supported by Philips. This project will provide free healthcare to children and families in over 20 slums in rural and urban Bangalore, right at their doorsteps. The community comprises mostly of migrants and is in constant search of daily labour work.
